Philippe: This is in the new code you added for package fragments.

The filename is 'rt.jar', not a .class or .java file.

What do you want to do? Should jar files be considered as part of the fragment?
Will investigate (will also need to backport to 2.1 stream)

Fix released in 3.0 and 2.1 stream.
Need regression tests.

Added JavaSearchTests.testPackageReference3() in both 3.0 and 2.1 maintenance 
streams.

Verified for 2.1.3 with build I200402251535.
I've used test case testPackageReference3 to verify that it fails in 2.1.2 and 
passes in 2.1.3...

causedBy.message: Compilation unit name must end with .java.
